contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: We look forward to meeting you
contact.description: At Han Kuyumculuk, we are here to provide you with the best service. Feel free to contact us for your questions, suggestions, or custom design requests.
contact.specialAppointmentDesc: You can book an appointment for custom design consultations and personalized shopping experiences. We look forward to offering you a unique experience.

appointment.title: Book an Appointment
appointment.subtitle: Take a step for your custom design process. Let's meet at a time that suits you.
appointment.selectDateTimeDesc: Choose a day and time that suits you
appointment.subject: Subject

elegance.title: Elegance
elegance.desc: We prioritize elegance in every design.

quality.title: Quality
quality.desc: We work with certified diamonds and the highest quality materials.

originality.title: Originality
originality.desc: Every piece of jewelry carries its own unique story.

trust.title: Trust
trust.desc: The trust we build with our customers is the foundation of our work.

blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: HAN BLOG
blog.notFoundDesc: The blog post you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.

customDesign.title: For You
customDesign.heroSubtitle: Everything starts with listening to you.
customDesign.philosophyTitle: True value lies in what belongs to you.
customDesign.philosophyDesc: What is custom-made does not fit into ready-made molds. It is more than a measurement; it is a stance, a need, a story.
customDesign.processIntro2: You want what you say to be understood, and what you want to express to be carefully considered.
customDesign.processIntro3: You seek detail. You expect every line, every texture to create a connection with you.
customDesign.freedomDesc: You expect options not to limit you, but to open up space for you.
customDesign.step1Desc: Jewelry begins with understanding you before taking shape. Expectations, emotions, and your story become clear at this stage. We listen to your feelings, intentions, and what you want to express.
customDesign.step2Desc: Measurements, textures, and details gradually emerge. This stage is not a decision but a discovery. Work continues until the piece finds itself. At this stage, your expectations and our technical knowledge and years of production experience come together. The design gains its true character in this phase.
customDesign.step3Desc: When the design is finalized, it comes to life as a unique piece in the hands of master craftsmen. The process continues meticulously until your expectations and wishes are fully met.
customDesign.step4Desc: The resulting jewelry is no longer just a design, but becomes a mark that belongs to you. Completion occurs when your expectations are fully met.
customDesign.darkDesc1: You expect a piece that feels like it belongs to you.
customDesign.darkDesc2: Not to someone else, but perfectly suited to you.
customDesign.ctaDesc: Offers a craftsmanship approach that listens, understands, and shapes for you.

gifts.title: Gifts
gifts.heroSubtitle: There are special days that leave a mark in hearts
gifts.philosophySubtitle: The most lasting way of saying "glad you exist"…
gifts.philosophyDesc: At Han, a gift is not just a jewelry selection; it is a gesture that has been heard, thought about, and imbued with meaning.
gifts.categoriesSubtitle: Selected, thoughtful, and an expression of long-term value
gifts.valueDesc: The most clear way of showing you care, you think, and you pay attention.
gifts.valueDesc2: It tells gratitude on Mother's Day, elegance on Women's Day, connection on Valentine's Day, and a shared story on anniversaries.
gifts.darkDesc1: Every piece adds value to the moment it is given, with its timeless design, balanced proportions, and masterful craftsmanship.
gifts.darkDesc2: It focuses on balance rather than show, mastery rather than exaggeration, permanence rather than temporariness.
gifts.darkDesc3: Because some gifts gain meaning not when they come out of the box, but when remembered years later…
gifts.ctaSubtitle: Whose life do you want to leave a mark on
gifts.ctaDesc: Selected, thoughtful, and an expression of long-term value

collection.title: Light of My Eyes
collection.heroSubtitle: Born from a closeness that never loses its value
collection.philosophyTitle: You are not someone who beautifies my life; you are where my life becomes meaningful.
collection.philosophyDesc: Light of My Eyes was born from a closeness that never loses its value. From a bright bond filtering through the window of the soul…
collection.discoverDesc: More than radiating light; to belong…
collection.detailDesc1: Every piece in this collection is a spiritual reflection of the pure love, protective instinct, and sense of being indispensable felt for someone.
collection.detailDesc2: Every touch, every detail carries the trace of a bond that has been carefully crafted, embracing, and completing.
collection.darkDesc1: Designed to make you feel, rather than to show off.
collection.darkDesc2: Han jewelry exists to make you feel special.
collection.darkDesc3: This is the story of someone very special… So where are you in it?
collection.ctaDesc: Selected, thoughtful, and an expression of long-term value

investment.title: Investment
investment.heroDesc: Look to the future with confidence. Convert your savings into precious metals with our investment gold products. Reliable and certified products.
investment.sectionDesc: From gram gold to full gold, from quarter to half gold, protect your savings with our wide range of products. Each product is certified to international standards.
investment.infoDesc1: Gold is the most reliable investment instrument that has preserved its value for centuries. Shape your investments with the assurance of Han Kuyumculuk.
investment.infoDesc2: Our expert consultants guide you in choosing products suitable for your investment goals. A peaceful investment experience with secure storage and insurance options.

productListing.appointmentDesc: Book an appointment for a one-on-one consultation with our expert team. Let's discover the perfect piece for you together.

metadata.title: Han Kuyumculuk | Diamond & Jewelry
metadata.description: Everything becomes beautiful with you… Carrying the elegance of love in every diamond.
